Description.Name: Pirate Kerby-Fu-Cheatah Console
Description.Details: Unlocked through Event by collecting lootbox components from Pirate Sponsored Contracts. So those crazy pirates have built a console to calculate Pirate Points. It gets power from the Pirate Drive Harness and then overrides a jumpships NavCom to allow the console operator to substitute new coordinates closer to the target planet. KF Consoles have 3 main parts: [[DM.UpgradeDefs[Gear_KerbyInjectors],Kerby Injectors]], [[DM.UpgradeDefs[Gear_FuCapacitor],Fu Capacitor]]s and a [[DM.UpgradeDefs[Gear_CheatahNavComputer],Cheatah Nav Computer]]. Blueprints are also needed for assembly. Doing specific Ambush, Rescue and Escort missions for Pirates will be rewarded with one of these parts.

AssignedCastDescription: Once the KF Console is coupled with the Pirate Drive Harness Upgrade, we will be able to shave perhaps another 10% off travel time by using Pirate Points. There are risks though...
